title: Deutsche Grammatik A1 - 200 Übungen Komplett
description: Umfassende Übungssammlung mit 200 Fragen für A1 Deutschlerner

exercises.question: Artikel im Akkusativ:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Neuter doesn't change in Akkusativ: das Buch.

exercises.question: Artikel mit Adjektiv:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'Hund' is masculine → der kleine Hund.

exercises.question: Artikel im Akkusativ:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Akkusativ neuter: 'das Kleid' stays 'das Kleid'.

exercises.question: Dativ nach Präposition:
exercises.template: Das Buch liegt unter ___ Tisch. (der Tisch)
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'unter' with location requires Dativ. 'der Tisch' → 'dem Tisch'.

exercises.question: Akkusativ einsetzen:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'kaufen' takes Akkusativ. Feminine doesn't change: 'die Zeitung'.

exercises.question: Genitiv-Attribut:
exercises.template: Das Haus ___ Nachbarn ist schön. (der Nachbar)

exercises.question: Dativ nach Präposition:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'neben' with location requires Dativ. 'die Freundin' → 'der Freundin'.

exercises.question: Akkusativ-Objekt:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'besuchen' takes Akkusativ. Neuter doesn't change: 'das Museum'.

exercises.question: Welcher Kasus nach 'für'?
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'für' requires Akkusativ. Feminine doesn't change: 'die Schwester'.

exercises.question: Genitiv nach Präposition:
exercises.template: Trotz ___ Kälte gehen wir spazieren. (die Kälte)

exercises.question: Verb mit Präposition:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'denken an' requires the preposition 'an' + Akkusativ.

exercises.question: Welches Verb passt?
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'Sport machen' is the correct expression.

exercises.question: Konjunktiv II:
exercises.template: Wenn ich reich ___, würde ich reisen. (sein)

exercises.question: Modalverb im Perfekt:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Perfect with modal verbs: 'habe ... müssen'.

exercises.question: Modalverb subjektiv:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'müssen' can express assumption: 'Er muss krank sein'.

exercises.question: Modalverb + Passiv:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Modal verb + passive infinitive: 'muss repariert werden'.

exercises.question: Artikel im Akkusativ:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Feminine articles don't change in Akkusativ.

exercises.question: Kontraktion:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'in' + 'dem' = 'im'. The book is already on the shelf (location).

exercises.question: Genitiv-Artikel:
exercises.template: Das Zimmer ___ Kindes ist sauber. (das Kind)

exercises.question: Genitiv-Form:
exercises.template: Die Farbe ___ Autos ist rot. (das Auto)

exercises.question: Akkusativ einsetzen:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'kennen' takes Akkusativ. Feminine doesn't change.

exercises.question: Akkusativ-Objekt:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'malen' takes Akkusativ. Neuter doesn't change.

exercises.question: Akkusativ einsetzen:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'suchen' takes Akkusativ. Neuter doesn't change.

exercises.question: Genitiv nach Präposition:
exercises.template: Wegen ___ Wetters bleiben wir zu Hause.

exercises.question: Akkusativ einsetzen:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'öffnen' takes Akkusativ. Neuter doesn't change.

exercises.question: Dativ nach Präposition:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'vor' with location requires Dativ: 'der Computer' → 'dem Computer'.

exercises.question: Reflexives Verb:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'sich freuen auf' - 'ich freue mich auf'.

exercises.question: Verb mit Präposition:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'warten auf' requires the preposition 'auf' + Akkusativ.

exercises.question: Hilfsverb wählen:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: For age, we use 'sein': 'Ich bin 25 Jahre alt'.

exercises.question: Konjunktiv II:
exercises.template: Wenn ich Zeit ___, würde ich kommen. (haben)

exercises.question: Verb mit Dativ:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'schmecken' requires Dativ: 'Das Essen schmeckt mir'.

exercises.question: Trennbares Verb:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'einladen' splits: 'Er lädt ... ein' (stem change a→ä).

exercises.question: Perfekt mit Modalverb:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Modal verbs in perfect use double infinitive.

exercises.question: Kein Plural-Unterschied:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'Lehrer' stays 'Lehrer' in plural (-er ending, no change).

exercises.question: Modalverb einsetzen:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'können' for 'ich' is 'kann' (ich kann nicht kommen).

exercises.question: Höfliche Form:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'Dürfte' is the most polite form for asking permission.

exercises.question: Modalverb einsetzen:
exercises.template: Wir ___ heute Abend ins Kino gehen. (wollen)

exercises.question: Subjektive Bedeutung:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'müssen' can express strong assumption: 'That must be true'.

exercises.question: Wunsch ausdrücken:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'möchte' expresses polite wish: 'I would like to'.

exercises.question: Fähigkeit ausdrücken:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'können' expresses ability: 'He can play piano well'.

exercises.question: Modalverb + trennbares Verb:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Modal + separable verb in infinitive: 'müssen aufstehen'.

exercises.question: Vermutung ausdrücken:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'müsste' (Konjunktiv) expresses assumption: 'She should be home'.

exercises.question: Absicht ausdrücken:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'wollen' expresses intention: 'I want to learn German'.

exercises.question: Modalverb objektiv:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'sollen' can mean 'supposed to': 'The package is supposed to arrive'.

exercises.question: Possessiv im Akkusativ:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: Akkusativ neuter: 'ihr Kleid' stays 'ihr neues Kleid'.

exercises.question: Präposition + Artikel (Kontraktion):
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'zu' + 'dem' = 'zum'. This contraction is mandatory in standard German.

exercises.question: Präposition + Artikel (Kontraktion):
exercises.template: Das Buch liegt ___ Tisch. (auf + der Tisch)
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'auf' + 'dem' doesn't contract. Use the full form 'auf dem Tisch'.

exercises.question: Welche Form ist richtig?
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'in' + 'das' = 'ins'. The contraction is preferred in everyday German.

exercises.question: Präposition + Artikel (Kontraktion):
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'von' + 'der' doesn't contract. Use the full form 'von der Schule'.

exercises.question: Präposition + Artikel (Kontraktion):
exercises.template: Das Auto steht ___ Haus. (vor + das Haus)
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'vor' + 'dem' doesn't contract. Use the full form 'vor dem Haus'.

exercises.question: Richtige Kontraktion:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'von' + 'dem' = 'vom'. This contraction is standard in German.

exercises.question: Kontraktion verwenden:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'an' + 'den' doesn't contract. Use full form 'an den Strand'.

exercises.question: Kontraktion oder nicht?:
exercises.explanation: Explanation: 'an' + 'der' doesn't contract. Use 'an der Bushaltestelle'.

categories.artikel: Definite and indefinite articles (der, die, das, ein, eine)
categories.modalverben: Modal verbs (können, müssen, dürfen, sollen, wollen, mögen)

difficulty_levels.advanced: A1.3 - Advanced A1 / transition to A2

instructions.file_format: Save this as .json file and load it using the '📁 Datei laden' button
instructions.usage: This file contains 200 additional exercises to supplement the built-in question bank
instructions.answer_format: Answers should be in lowercase for consistency
instructions.explanation_language: Explanations are in English for better understanding
